With a 3-month timeframe and a mix of watching methods, let's try to estimate the number of movies you've watched. Don't worry too much about exact numbers; we can make some rough estimates based on your habits.

**Cinema trips**: You mentioned watching "Birds of Prey" on a solo trip to the cinema. Have you been to the cinema more than once in the past 3 months? If so, roughly how many times?

**Streaming services**: You've been watching movies on Netflix and possibly other streaming services. Do you usually watch 1-2 movies per week, or more/less than that?

**Laptop watching**: When you're traveling, do you usually watch 1-2 movies per trip, or more/less than that?

**Re-watches**: You mentioned re-watching the "Harry Potter" series. Have you re-watched other movies or franchises as well? If so, roughly how many?

**Action movies and dramas**: You mentioned leaning towards these genres lately. Have you watched any notable action movies or dramas that come to mind?

Let's fill in these blanks, and I can help you make an educated estimate of how many movies you've watched in the past 3 months.

(By the way, re-watching the "Harry Potter" series is a great way to pass the time!)
